pages.text: Or do you think that most of them listen or understand? They are like animals. No, but they are more lost from a (right) way
Did you not see how you Master makes the shadow longer, and if He wanted He would have made it stand still, and We made the sun its guide
Then We pull it toward Ourselves, an easy pull
And He is the One who made the night as a cover for you, and the sleep as a rest, and He made the day to rise up (and work)
And He is the One who sent the winds as good news before His mercy, and We sent down pure water from the sky
In order to bring the dead land back to life with it, and make Our numerous creation of livestock and human beings drink it
And We have certainly explained it to them (in various ways) so that they may take notice, but most people refuse to be anything except ungrateful (and disbeliever)
And if We wanted, We would have raised a warner in every town
So do not obey the disbelievers, and try hard against them with it (Quran), a great try
And He is the One who merged the two seas, this one sweet and drinkable and that one salty and bitter, and He placed a barrier and a forbidden ban between them
And He is the One who created a human being from the water, then He made him blood relative and marriage relative. Your Master is capable
And they serve other than God that which does not benefit them and does not harm them, and the disbeliever is a supporter (of others) against his Master
